thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 8 of 186
thread.title: Dave Williams

author: Dave Williams
title: Dave Williams
text:
I live chatted to cancel my auto-renew membership due to you guys have already filled my position I needed to have filled. For that thank you. Cancelling was super easy and painless, the woman I was working with was Desirea and she was quick and responsive to act. Which makes me feel good as customer to come back and use you service again anytime I need a position filled at my store.
Thank You
Dave W.
